Token.Abstract: Functions as a proxy for one or more other objects of any class and forwards each message to all proxied objects.

Returns an autoreleased object that will dispatch all messages to the provided objects as they are received. The order of the objects in the argument list determines the order in which method lookup and dispatch occurs.

Returns an autoreleased object that will dispatch all messages to the provided objects as they are received. The order of the objects in the array determines the order in which method lookup and dispatch occurs.
